answers.answer: My cousin had hers at 36 she was premie but she was perfectly fine
Two friends this year had their lil girls at 35 weeks. One was because of preeclamsia. Both girls and moms are doing really well!

I had my last child at 36 she was perfect only issues we had was her blood sugar in the hospital that got better after she had formula and at her first Dr appointment we were 're admitted to the hospital due to jaundice but was fine after that she's 2 now and is perfectly healthy and is reached all her milestones if not exceeds them
My little girl was born at 36 weeks, qas perfect! We actually went home the next day! :)
My son was born at 36 weeks due to preeclampsia and only issue he had was he wasn't able to maintain his own body temperature, he was in nicu for 2 weeks other than that perfectly healthy.

Pregnancy and babies are different we all anit going to have the same outcome but most women's on here believe you have to go the full term (10 months count it up ladies before messaging back with rude feed back) for a baby to be healthy, you and your angel will be fine

question: Im 29 weeks and the doctor says due to pre eclampsia I would have to have a c section around 35 weeks Has anyone had 35 week healthy babies
title: Having a 35 week baby
